import { useState } from "react"; import "./Register.scss"; const Register = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "" }) const inputs = [ { id: 1, name: "username", type: "text", placeholder: "Enter username", label: "Username", }, ] const handleChange = (e) => { setInput({...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(input) } return (

handleChange(e)} /> User name must be between 3-16 characters
handleChange(e)} /> Valid email is required

handleChange(e)} /> Confirm password is wrong
); }; export default Register
